subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: John Gadret of France used a late attack to win the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Alberto Contador of Spain took fifth and retained the overall lead by 59 seconds.
snippet: John Gadret of France used a late attack to win the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Alberto Contador of Spain took fifth and retained the overall lead by 59 seconds.
